0b84aeb0a22ca32d25172feae4e52641cc351a1b.query:
SELECT election_date FROM election
                WHERE id = $1

0eee5df33c2b200496814ed0a2e00e9a56e6e97c.query:
SELECT
                id,
                user_id,
                election_id,
                title,
                description,
                created_at,
                updated_at
            FROM
                voting_guide
            WHERE
                id = ANY ($1)

15e92e08e433cfb688e6d825fb533bdc7da0a92b.query:
SELECT
                    a.congressional_district,
                    a.state_senate_district,
                    a.state_house_district,
                    a.state AS "state:State",
                    a.county,
                    a.city
                FROM
                    address AS a
                    JOIN user_profile up ON user_id = $1
                WHERE
                    up.user_id = $1 AND 
                    up.address_id = a.id

1b1fe12ab083a92b7806376afc9dead1d8b7942c.query:
SELECT
                id,
                slug,
                title,
                description,
                state AS "state:State",
                election_date
            FROM
                election
            WHERE election_date > NOW()
            ORDER BY
                election_date ASC
            LIMIT 1

1b8939bb7ba77bffe92099fddb0d02a13f398ca4.query:
UPDATE user_profile SET profile_picture_url = $1
            WHERE user_id = $2

2cd61a6985cb75f4609a4207777531456f166d76.query:
SELECT id, slug, title, bill_number, legislation_status AS "legislation_status:LegislationStatus", description, official_summary, populist_summary, full_text_url, legiscan_bill_id,  legiscan_session_id, legiscan_committee_id, legiscan_committee, legiscan_last_action, legiscan_last_action_date, legiscan_data, history, state AS "state: State", votesmart_bill_id, political_scope AS "political_scope: PoliticalScope", bill_type, chamber AS "chamber: Chamber", attributes, b.created_at, b.updated_at FROM bill b
                JOIN bill_sponsors 
                ON bill_sponsors.bill_id = id
                WHERE bill_sponsors.politician_id = $1

32fa3a2ee0792beb058194ab48e1e0d6690707a3.query:
UPDATE populist_user 
                SET reset_token = $1,
                    reset_token_expires_at = $2
                WHERE email = LOWER($3)

378bcb76f24be0d6bb95610121204040c5a98f5f.query:
UPDATE populist_user 
            SET confirmed_at = now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc',
                confirmation_token = NULL
            WHERE confirmation_token = $1 
            AND confirmed_at IS NULL
            RETURNING id

3890dd0b74b9e3a9a8a89a7f25bd8ffeb253d911.query:
SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email, first_name, last_name, profile_picture_url FROM user_profile up
            JOIN populist_user u ON up.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = $1

41b07e7fe70a2dc38e96ad3b21f69aaba3112163.query:
SELECT
                ROUND(CAST(CAST(rc.votes AS FLOAT) / CAST(r.total_votes AS FLOAT) * 100 AS NUMERIC), 1)::FLOAT AS "percentage"
            FROM
                race_candidates rc
                JOIN race r ON rc.race_id = $2
            WHERE
                rc.candidate_id = $1
                AND rc.race_id = $2
                AND rc.votes IS NOT NULL
                AND r.id = $2

45511ed5bc15b038bd5df65034d5433381e173bd.query: SELECT id, slug, title, description, state AS "state:State", election_date FROM election WHERE id = $1

604858fafe8b5b14d44db393e5bfb9a5db3fa410.query:
SELECT
                u.id,
                u.username,
                u.email,
                up.first_name,
                up.last_name,
                up.profile_picture_url
            FROM
                populist_user u
                JOIN user_profile up ON u.id = up.user_id
            WHERE
                u.id = $1

6574a1f62eced11151acc740651c859932667e12.query:
DELETE FROM populist_user WHERE email = $1
            RETURNING id

722cfb9974f5c78359106ea1754801fb454006b9.query:
UPDATE user_profile SET first_name = $1, last_name = $2
            WHERE user_id = $3
            RETURNING first_name, last_name

7a8d35cc4c32926a7c467e4e12ccafd35271d66a.query:
SELECT
                id,
                slug,
                title,
                office_id,
                race_type AS "race_type:RaceType",
                party AS "party:PoliticalParty",
                state AS "state:State",
                description,
                ballotpedia_link,
                early_voting_begins_date,
                winner_ids,
                total_votes,
                official_website,
                election_id,
                is_special_election,
                num_elect,
                created_at,
                updated_at
            FROM
                race
            WHERE
                election_id = $1
            ORDER BY title DESC

7c3de9dc9a7a66c521d2884819f21bde79f41cbb.query: SELECT id FROM populist_user WHERE email = $1

822ee3352cf0ade11df3adc9a2cc34597badffb6.query:
SELECT
                    candidate_id,
                    is_endorsement,
                    note
                FROM
                    voting_guide_candidates
                WHERE
                    voting_guide_id = $1
                    AND (is_endorsement = true OR note IS NOT NULL)

84e93c241bdfec0a18207888eef72b8edf8f32a7.query: SELECT id, slug, title, description, state AS "state:State", election_date FROM election WHERE slug = $1

8ab1b2b1af80ada2573bdbca3e0538d90e8201b7.query:
INSERT INTO voting_guide_candidates (voting_guide_id, candidate_id, is_endorsement, note)
                VALUES($1, $2, COALESCE($3, FALSE), $4) ON CONFLICT (voting_guide_id, candidate_id)
                DO
                UPDATE
                SET
                    is_endorsement = COALESCE($3, voting_guide_candidates.is_endorsement, FALSE),
                    note = COALESCE($4, voting_guide_candidates.note)
            WHERE (SELECT user_id FROM voting_guide WHERE id = $1) = $5
            RETURNING
                candidate_id,
                is_endorsement,
                note

93de20a6f00b41aea7ccc24d594baec17dbb2b8c.query:
UPDATE populist_user SET username = $1
            WHERE id = $2
            RETURNING id, email, username, password, role AS "role:Role", created_at, confirmed_at, updated_at

9752c632838d60c60cf2615399e4e4ad32e59ea3.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    slug,
                    title,
                    description,
                    state AS "state:State",
                    election_date
                FROM
                    election
                WHERE
                    state = $1
                    OR state IS NULL
                ORDER BY
                    election_date ASC

993b378b12893627177c61e7e00d4a7d02605423.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    slug,
                    first_name,
                    middle_name,
                    last_name,
                    suffix,
                    preferred_name,
                    biography,
                    biography_source,
                    home_state AS "home_state:State",
                    date_of_birth,
                    office_id,
                    upcoming_race_id,
                    thumbnail_image_url,
                    assets,
                    official_website_url,
                    campaign_website_url,
                    facebook_url,
                    twitter_url,
                    instagram_url,
                    youtube_url,
                    linkedin_url,
                    tiktok_url,
                    email,
                    phone,
                    party AS "party:PoliticalParty",
                    votesmart_candidate_id,
                    votesmart_candidate_bio,
                    votesmart_candidate_ratings,
                    legiscan_people_id,
                    crp_candidate_id,
                    fec_candidate_id,
                    race_wins,
                    race_losses,
                    p.created_at,
                    p.updated_at
                FROM
                    politician p
                    JOIN race_candidates rc ON race_id = $1
                WHERE
                    p.id = rc.candidate_id
                    AND rc.is_running = TRUE

99728ea8f582a2e25a21a4dd87ddd45ad69bdbd1.query:
SELECT
                r.id,
                r.slug,
                r.title,
                r.office_id,
                r.race_type AS "race_type:RaceType",
                r.party AS "party:PoliticalParty",
                r.state AS "state:State",
                r.description,
                r.ballotpedia_link,
                r.early_voting_begins_date,
                r.winner_ids,
                r.total_votes,
                r.official_website,
                r.election_id,
                r.is_special_election,
                r.num_elect,
                r.created_at,
                r.updated_at
            FROM
                race r
                JOIN office o ON office_id = o.id
            WHERE
                r.election_id = $1 AND (
                    o.election_scope = 'national'
                    OR (o.state = $2 AND o.election_scope = 'state')
                    OR (o.state = $2 AND (  
                       (o.election_scope = 'city' AND o.municipality = $3) OR
                       (o.election_scope = 'county' AND o.county = $4) OR
                       (o.election_scope = 'district' AND o.district_type = 'us_congressional' AND o.district = $5) OR
                       (o.election_scope = 'district' AND o.district_type = 'state_senate' AND o.district = $6) OR
                       (o.election_scope = 'district' AND o.district_type = 'state_house' AND o.district = $7) OR
                       (o.election_scope = 'district' AND o.district_type = 'county' AND county = $3 AND o.district = $8) OR
                       (CASE 
                         WHEN $10 = '01' THEN
                          (o.election_scope = 'district' AND o.district_type = 'school' AND REPLACE(o.school_district, 'ISD #', '') = $9) AND
                          (o.election_scope = 'district' AND o.district_type = 'school' AND o.district IS NULL OR o.district = $11)
                         WHEN $10 = '03' THEN
                           (o.election_scope = 'district' AND o.district_type = 'school' AND REPLACE(o.school_district, 'SSD #', '') = $9) AND
                           (o.election_scope = 'district' AND o.district_type = 'school' AND o.district IS NULL OR o.district = $11)
                        END)
                    )))
            ORDER BY o.priority ASC, title DESC

9a729b061294493dec40a66d979fa4bdaa369823.query:
UPDATE populist_user SET email = $1
            WHERE id = $2
            RETURNING id, email, username, password, role AS "role:Role", created_at, confirmed_at, updated_at

a07d35cc871557a18f7072e324420298b53a200d.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    user_id,
                    election_id,
                    title,
                    description,
                    created_at,
                    updated_at
                FROM
                    voting_guide
                WHERE
                    election_id = $1 AND
                    user_id = $2

a102667e93b255f93f53a4251dcadea174cfe875.query:
SELECT
                id,
                organization_id,
                politician_id,
                election_id,
                notes,
                issue_tag_ids,
                created_at,
                updated_at
            FROM
                organization_politician_notes
            WHERE
                election_id = $1 AND
                organization_id = $2

a16cc418ecb64d3c9b6d0df577b60d7f250d158d.query:
SELECT
                    id AS candidate_id,
                    rc.votes,
                    rc.race_id
                FROM
                    politician p
                    JOIN race_candidates rc ON race_id = $1
                WHERE
                    p.id = rc.candidate_id AND 
                    rc.race_id = $1

a83fff8098c363ef44c80aa1efda7d63f5f5c283.query:
WITH up AS (
                SELECT
                    profile_picture_url
                FROM
                    user_profile
                WHERE
                    user_id = $1
            )
            UPDATE user_profile SET profile_picture_url = NULL
            WHERE user_id = $1
            RETURNING (SELECT profile_picture_url FROM up)

a9d971191a04c23d36dcdd69d1872c580ea082c4.query:
DELETE FROM voting_guide
            WHERE id = $1
            RETURNING
                id

ad8167f39652a8fef007d2d756366f7a1c7f28b5.query:
SELECT
                votes
            FROM
                race_candidates
            WHERE
                race_candidates.candidate_id = $1 AND
                race_candidates.race_id = $2

b16a90415ad9c7504dee58ddb432807631c759da.query:
DELETE FROM populist_user WHERE id = $1
            RETURNING id

b2b3a3c199ac067e31e62df429537746a407d10a.query:
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN position = 'support' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as support,
                       SUM(CASE WHEN position = 'neutral' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as neutral,
                       SUM(CASE WHEN position = 'oppose' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as oppose
                FROM bill_public_votes WHERE bill_id = $1

b5cc088e40d5bbf140044ee2d61f1383a2a23123.query:
SELECT
                    a.state AS "state:State"
                FROM
                    address a
                    JOIN user_profile up ON user_id = $1
                WHERE
                    up.user_id = $1 AND 
                    up.address_id = a.id

b5f8bb777be364f196aa0da547e7527cf58249eb.query:
SELECT password FROM populist_user 
            WHERE id = $1

b6a100808e5bb33bba3bd43585e7712b965d9588.query:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM populist_user
            JOIN user_profile ON populist_user.id = user_profile.user_id
            JOIN address a ON user_profile.address_id = a.id
            WHERE ($1::text IS NULL OR a.state = $1)

c15699627787fb10b64a7f8496a85d0c02091c23.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
                r.id,
                r.slug,
                r.title,
                office_id,
                race_type AS "race_type:RaceType",
                party AS "party:PoliticalParty",
                r.state AS "state:State",
                r.description,
                ballotpedia_link,
                early_voting_begins_date,
                winner_ids,
                total_votes,
                official_website,
                election_id,
                is_special_election,
                num_elect,
                r.created_at,
                r.updated_at,
                o.priority 
            FROM
                race r
            JOIN office o ON o.id = r.office_id
            JOIN race_candidates rc ON rc.race_id = r.id
            JOIN voting_guide_candidates vgc ON vgc.candidate_id = rc.candidate_id
            WHERE
                r.election_id = $1 AND
                vgc.voting_guide_id = $2 AND 
                (vgc.is_endorsement = true OR vgc.note IS NOT NULL)
            ORDER BY o.priority ASC, r.title DESC

c2c46ee84c24b520439da7dd5b5cbf48794f5b52.query:
UPDATE voting_guide_candidates
            SET note = NULL
            WHERE voting_guide_id = $1 AND candidate_id = $2
            RETURNING
                candidate_id,
                is_endorsement,
                note

e1ad50c24e7b79cea67dfe9c6d3799e19c09abb8.query:
SELECT
              total_votes,
              winner_ids
            FROM
              race
            WHERE
              id = $1

fbe195dc1dc227ee320fa642422a3928f87cf899.query:
INSERT INTO voting_guide (id, user_id, election_id, title, description)
                VALUES($1, $2, $3, $4, $5) ON CONFLICT (id)
                DO
                UPDATE
                SET
                    title = $3,
                    description = $4
            RETURNING
                id,
                user_id,
                election_id,
                title,
                description,
                created_at,
                updated_at
